data_table.description: Physical Activity Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC1
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Exercise or play sports [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC2
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q2. First activity code [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC3
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q3. First activity hours per week [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC4
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q4. First activity months per year [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC5
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q5. Do you do other exercises or play other sports? [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC6
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q6. What is your second most frequent sport or exercise? [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC7
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q7. Second activity hours per weak [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC8
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q8. Second activity months per year [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC9
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Does third activity [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC10
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q10. Third activity code [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC11
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q11. Third activity hours per week [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC12
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q12. Third activity months per year [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC13
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q13. Does fourth activity [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC14
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q14. Fourth activity code [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC15
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q15. Fourth activity hours per week [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC16
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q16. Fourth activity months per year [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC17
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q17. Does more than 4 physical activities [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC18
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q18. Exercise in leisure time [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC19
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q19. Leisure time activity compared to others of same age [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC20
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q20. Sweat during leisure time [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC21
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q21. TV during leisure time [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC22
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q22. Walk during leisure time [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC23
variable.description: A. Sports and Leisure. Q23. Bike during leisure time [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PAC0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Year Of Completion Date [Physical Activity Form]
